title: Asgaard Sofa
description: Setting the bar as one of the loudest speakers in its class, the Asgaard Sofa is a compact, stout-hearted hero with a well-balanced audio sound which boosts a clear midrange and extended highs for a balanced experience.
longDescription: Embodying the raw, wayward spirit of rock 'n' roll, the Asgaard Sofa is a compact, stout-hearted hero with a well-balanced design which boosts clear midrange and extended highs for sound that is both articulate and pronounced. The analogue knobs allow you to fine-tune the controls to your personal preferences, while the guitar-influenced leather strap enables easy and stylish transport.

title: Trenton modular sofa_3
description: A modern modular sofa designed for comfort and versatility, perfect for any living space.
longDescription: The Trenton modular sofa is a perfect blend of style and comfort, designed to fit seamlessly into any modern home. Crafted with premium materials, it offers durability and timeless appeal.

title: Granite dining table with dining chair
description: Elegant granite dining table paired with comfortable dining chairs.
longDescription: This set combines the durability of granite with the elegance of modern design. Accompanied by ergonomically designed chairs, it creates a sophisticated dining experience.

title: Outdoor bar table and stool
description: A stylish outdoor bar table paired with matching stools.
longDescription: Ideal for entertaining guests, this bar table set is weather-resistant and crafted for outdoor use. Its sleek design adds sophistication to any patio or garden.

title: Plain console with teak mirror
description: A sleek plain console paired with an elegant teak-framed mirror.
longDescription: Perfect for any hallway or entryway, this console and mirror set combines simplicity and elegance, offering both functionality and style.

title: Grain coffee table
description: A contemporary coffee table with a unique grain pattern.
longDescription: This coffee table features a stunning grain pattern that makes it a centerpiece in any living room. Crafted with care for both style and utility.

title: Kent coffee table
longDescription: With a sleek design and durable construction, the Kent coffee table fits perfectly in modern and traditional homes alike.
